name: Droid Buster
description:
This game was created for the Zx Dev 2019 Mia Remakes. 

The city of Hexagon was at the peak of its technological development.

When Artificial Consciousness (ArC0n) took control of all defense systems and declared war on the human race.

Among the survivors was born a rumor, about the existence of a man with cyber fists, who managed to escape from the ArCon laboratories, and is capable of destroying any enemy droid with a powerful blow.

This is the legend of Frank Talbot. Better known as: Droid Buster.

Idea and code: Ariel Endaraues
Testing: Alexis Vorian
Music: Pedro Pimenta
Loading Screen: Juan A. Fernández

It is made with Jonathan Cauldwell's AGD
And Musicizer by David Saphier.

Keys
Q A O P and SPACE
